DOC.brief_title: Standard Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Versus Genomic Driven Chemotherapy Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: After core biopsy , tumor profile use Affymetrix U133plus2 gene expression array . DLD30 score ( Hess , JCO , 2006 ) TOP2A expression quantify . Patients either treat 4FEC follow 4 docetaxel ( standard arm ) genomic-driven regimen ( experiemental arm ) . In experimental arm , patient high DLD30 receive 3 month weekly paclitaxel follow 4 FEC , patient high TOP2A receive 4FEC 4 docetaxel , patient low DLD30 low TOP2A treat 6 cycle docetaxel-capecitabine .
